article_node.title: Suze Orman Breaks Down Big Beautiful Bill Act Perks: $10K Car Loan Deductions, $25K Tip Exemptions, And A $1K Gift For Every Baby
article_node.summary: The One Big Beautiful Bill Act has generated discussion, particularly regarding its financial benefits highlighted by expert Suze Orman on her podcast. Key features include an expanded child tax credit of up to $2,200 per child, a new deduction for personal auto loan interest up to $10,000, and a tax exemption for up to $25,000 in tip income for workers. Orman encourages taxpayers to take advantage of these benefits before they expire in 2028, despite her criticisms of the bill.
